name: Pro Survey
description: Pro Survey is a powerful survey tool that allows Surveyor to create surveys and admins to distribute surveys easily. Users can participate in surveys, and there is a payment system in place. Pro users can access hidden benefits. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Daisy UI, MongoDB, CRUD operations, React Icons, Firebase, Stripe for payments, and GitHub.

name: JobQuestHub
description: JobQuestHub is an innovative platform connecting job seekers with employers seamlessly. Built using React, Node.js, MongoDB, JWT, Framer Motion, Firebase, Daisy UI, Tailwind CSS, and more.

name: Eco Artisan
description: Eco Artisan showcases eco-friendly products such as pottery, clay-made pots, sculptures created by artisans, promoting sustainable practices. Users can add their favorite goods and delete items. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Daisy UI, MongoDB, CRUD operations, React Icons, Firebase, and GitHub.
